question:
Mary moved to the bathroom. Sandra journeyed to the bedroom. Mary got the football there. John went to the kitchen. Mary went back to the kitchen. Mary went back to the garden. Where is the football?
(1) garden (2) hallway (3) kitchen
answer: From the text, Mary went to the bathroom and then to the kitchen. Sandra went to the bedroom. John went to the kitchen. Mary went back to the kitchen and then to the garden. So, the football is in the kitchen. So the answer is: (3) kitchen. </s>
